title: Recommend citation
body_html:
Hello :-)

This PR inserts the BibTeX snippet mentioned in #4126 as its own file, as recommended by the Software Sustainability Institute. Additionally, it would be possible make the code itself citable, see guides.github.com/activities/citable-code

Cheers!

PS: There is a Software Citation Implementation Working Group, discussing additional options

body:
Hello :-)

This PR inserts the BibTeX snippet mentioned in #4126 as its own file, as recommended by the [Software Sustainability Institute](https://www.software.ac.uk/blog/2013-09-02-encouraging-citation-software-introducing-citation-files). Additionally, it would be possible make the code itself citable, see [guides.github.com/activities/citable-code](https://guides.github.com/activities/citable-code/)

Cheers!

PS: There is a [Software Citation Implementation Working Group, discussing additional options](https://github.com/force11/force11-sciwg/issues)
